scripts.deploy-circle: npm run deploy-circle:ios && npm run deploy-circle:android
scripts.deploy-circle:ios: npm run build-circle:ios && aws s3 sync build/ios s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/ap-multilanguage-rn/0.0.3/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --content-type application/javascript
scripts.deploy-circle:android: npm run build-circle:android && aws s3 sync build/android s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/ap-multilanguage-rn/0.0.3/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --cache-control max-age=600 --content-type application/javascript
scripts.build-circle:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output build/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest build/android/assets/
scripts.build-circle:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output build/ios/index.ios.bundle
scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output build/ios/index.ios.bundle.js
scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output build/android/index.android.bundle.js --assets-dest build/assets/
